title: Rain on Fairyland
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 30L
description: Rain on Fairyland allows students to enter a fantasy land filled with fairies as well as many familiar items. Charming illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify setting and to recognize and classify nouns.
meta: animals, fairies, flowers, leaves, rain, roofs
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Suffixes : Recognize and use the suffix -s
